name: Second Mile Behavioral Health
description: Second Mile Behavioral Health is a mental health collective providing comprehensive behavioral health services in London, Kentucky and surrounding areas. The organization operates multiple offices including London, Knox, and Dog Patch locations. Services include individual and group therapy, case management, community support services, and mental health counseling. The organization focuses on providing accessible mental health care with a family-oriented approach, offering both in-person and online therapy options. Second Mile Behavioral Health is committed to helping individuals and families achieve mental wellness through evidence-based treatment approaches.
source: Verified from official Second Mile Behavioral Health website and multiple online directories
eligibility: Open to individuals seeking mental health services. May accept various insurance plans and offer sliding scale fees.
notes: Main office located in London with additional offices in Knox (606-546-5374) and Dog Patch (606-260-8905). The organization operates as a mental health collective with multiple therapists and case managers. Contact for current availability and insurance acceptance.
